BasicInfo.short: Endurance is a technological start-up, specializing in development and sales of technological products: lasers, robots, drones.

Products.name: SelfieBot
Products.description: SelfieBot with follow me function. It is a gadget that changes the way you make video calls with your tablets and cell phones.

Products.name: Modified Endurance drone quadcopter (UAV)
Products.description: The Endurance UAV quadcopter is ready for shipment for a very low price.

Products.name: Telepresence system
Products.description: The Endurance Telepresence robot (rig) is a new dimension of communication.
